casebody.data:
EVERBANK COMMERCIAL FINANCE, INC., Plaintiff,
v.
The HUNOVAL LAW FIRM, PLLC, Mathias H. Hunoval, and Christina R. Hunoval, Defendants/Third-Party Plaintiffs,
v.
CSI Finance Leasing, Inc., Third-Party Defendant. No. COA18-909 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 6, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART.
